abstract: Andy Murray beats Mischa Zverev, 6-2, 6-2, moving on to quarterfinals at BMW Open; other tennis scores noted.
lead_paragraph: Top-seeded Andy Murray began his clay-court season by reaching the BMW Open quarterfinals in Munich.

headline.print_headline: Sports Briefing | Tennis; Murray Wins on Clay

snippet: Top-seeded Andy Murray began his clay-court season by reaching the BMW Open quarterfinals in Munich.
